about.name: About
about.p1: Bookend is a web application to share books and it was thanks to the idea that arose when I was looking to carry out fullstack development practices.
about.p2: A social network service is born in one of the great social networks such as facebook, instagram, twitter and others.
about.p3: Typescript, nextJS, graphql with apollo client, apollo-server-micro, apollo-server, mongoose, mongodb, passport-jwt, postcss, tailwindcss

display.title: Display and languages
display.p1: Mode your dark night screen. This makes it easier to look at the screen or read in low light and can help you fall asleep more easily.
